com.communote.server.core.common.caching

Interface AccessRestrictedCacheElementProvider<T extends CacheKey,U extends Serializable>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The cache key.
    U - The object to cache.
    All Superinterfaces:
    CacheElementProvider<T,U>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ImageCacheElementProvider

    public interface AccessRestrictedCacheElementProvider<T extends CacheKey,U extends Serializable>
extends CacheElementProvider<T,U>
    This element provider checks for authorization first.
